Player History
Drafted in 37th round, 583rd overall pick, by Colorado in 2015...
Released by Colorado on 3/2/2016...
Signed as a free agent by Seattle on 4/16/2017 to a 1-year deal worth $550,000 per year...
Had first career hit on 4/30/2017, off Jose Mejia (KC)...
Earned first career win on 4/30/2017...
Was claimed off waivers by New York on 8/4/2017.
Signed as a free agent by Chicago on 2/17/2018 to a 3-year deal worth $501,000 per year...
Injured on 7/22/2018 with a Pulled Bicep Tendon, out for 2 weeks...
Signed as a free agent by Colorado on 2/3/2021 to a 2-year deal worth $3,000,000 per year...
Was claimed off waivers by Chicago on 6/21/2021.
